name: DestressCube
description:
Destress Cube is a game that provides a fun and interactive way to reduce stress and improve concentration. The game is an adaptation of the classic Whack-a-Mole game, where the objective is to hit active cubes within a certain time limit and score points.

The cubes appear and disappear at random intervals, challenging the player’s concentration and reaction time. The objective of the game is to hit as many cubes as possible within the given time frame and achieve a high score.
